attributes.action: bring Lal Mohammad, who had his nose & ears cut off for daring to vote, to the UK for hospital treatment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We should show solidarity for the poor people of Afghanistan who were punished for daring to use their democratic rights and vote, and stood up against the evil Taliban. Bring this poor man to the UK for hospital treatment - maybe even plastic surgery.
